headline.print_headline: ArcelorMittal, Bekaert Swap Stakes in Latin America Wire Ventures
headline.main: ArcelorMittal, Bekaert Swap Stakes in Latin America Wire Ventures

lead_paragraph: ArcelorMittal SA, the world's largest steelmaker, and Bekaert Group on Wednesday agreed to swap their stakes in their Brazil, Costa Rica and Ecuador ventures, part of a broader plan to extend a four-decade partnership in fast-growing markets, an executive said.
